39849.name: PISA: Mean performance on the mathematics scale
39849.description: Average score of 15-year-old students on the PISA mathematics scale. The metric for the overall mathematics scale is based on a mean for OECD countries of 500 points and a standard deviation of 100 points. Data reflects country performance in the stated year according to PISA reports, but may not be comparable across years or countries. Consult the PISA website for more detailed information: http://www.oecd.org/pisa/
39849.s_name: World Bank EdStats: PISA: Mean performance on the mathematics scale

source.name: World Bank EdStats: PISA: Mean performance on the mathematics scale
